name: Gunning Out Of Space - Post Compo Version
name_original: Gunning Out Of Space - Post Compo Version
description:
This is a post compo version. The orginal game is here : https://ytaha.itch.io/gunning-out-of-space

Use your buble gun to shoot zombies, if you miss, the bubles will fill up the room and eventually, you will run out of space.

Controls

  • WASD -  Movement
  • Left click - Shooting
  • Right click - Throwing grenade
  • "R" Key - Restart

This game is made by Yusuf Taha in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 42

This is a Compo project.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/$11102511025
